Articles.Content:
There is a hole at the bottom of the crater where a hole was blasted into a nuclear bunker, and some of the dirt fell in to create a hill at the bottom

My underground hill

I fill in the crater to make a flat gravel ruin.

My desolate plain.

I use Government.

My WHite House.

Your girlfriend paints it pink.

Your Pink House.
The Pink House is bombed and the rubble and dirt form a hill. My Rubble Hill

A moderator comes along and removes political content from the thread and the hill.

(Yes, there was actually political content in a forum game... please don't do that)

My hill.

A non-moderator comes along with his excavator and removes your hill, leaving behind a big crater and another large hill about twenty meters away.

![Top-7-biggest-mining-excavators-in-the-w](http://www.911metallurgist.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/Top-7-biggest-mining-excavators-in-the-world.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2017-08-21T14:54:22Z" title="08/21/2017 02:54  PM" data-short="6 yr">August 21, 2017</time> by adsii1970**

A A-10 arrives, BRRRRRTing your excavator away.

My hill

I take the crater you left vacant

My not very wise strategic move

Wait.......

I knew I forgot something ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

hmm What does this button do?

![pciuH0L.png](http://i.imgur.com/pciuH0L.png)

oh

No ones crater

it's not a crater, it's an anti-hill, with negative height.

Every time when a meteorite hits the planet surface, such anti-hills grow up.

I build a astroid defense system. 

My anti-hill

The asteroid defense fails because Someone disabled it and an asteroid smashes into it, creating a bigger anti hill and the rubble forms a dirt hill that is used as a pitchers mound. My pitchers mound.

I retreat to a red giant 100ly away and build a Nicoll Dyson Beam and sterilise the entire planet and blow the atmosphere.

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RjtFnWh53z0?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

I then build a large hill.

My hill.

The red giant becomes a white dwarf.

Hill Nebula

RESET BUTTON

My hill.

> Reset sequence successfully finished. > Hill owner:
> Previous owner status:
I use the Death Star to blow up all the hills and get a hill on a new planet.

I git Obi-Wan Kenobi to blow up the Death Star.

My martian hill.

I crush the Death Star with a 20x oversized Mammoth engine, gather it's dust and build a flying hill on a strut net hold by 4 SRBs, plant my flag and a coconut palm.

My flat world hill.

I disprove Flat Earth.

My planet.

I bomb you planet to tiny bits, and stomp on them. 

My planet bits.

I kill you and re-assemble them.

My red planet.
I cut the ends of your planet. It becomes a *plane*. My plane.
